original_title: Love Skills: A Guide to the Pleasures of Sex
overview: Every man and woman has the potential to experience lovemaking at its best. All you need is desire. Love Skills shows you how to express it. This carefully produced documentary is introduced by Joshua S. Golden, M.D., the directory of U.C.L.A 's Human Sexuality program, who, along with a prestigious team of doctors, counselors and therapists has designed a unique way for people to expand their sexual horizons.
title: Love Skills: A Guide to the Pleasures of Sex
